title.narrative: UNIFIL MICRO PROJECTS FOR ADVANCEMENT AND DEVELOPMENT OF LOCAL

description.narrative: Since 2011, an annual allocation has been made available for the Defence Forces contingent to use under the UNIFIL micro-projects scheme. Facilitated by the peacekeeping forces and implemented by local actors, these projects contribute to the advancement and development of local communities through the provision of vital public services. 2020 expenditure included a water purification system; light poles and street lighting; recycling facilities; and educational and community facilities. The projects conform to Irish Aid humanitarian principles, including infrastructural development which has longevity, particularly in the area of education, shelter, welfare or health; projects which do not impose ongoing additional significant demands, financial or otherwise, on local communities with limited resources; and projects where local agencies, community groups, NGOs, State bodies or local authorities are supportive and engaged.
